API

Frostbite scripting API is a specification of the tools that can be used for performing scripting tasks. The API documentation is generated using YARD documentation engine.

Core API Functions

  • #echo
  • #require
  • #load
  • #move
  • #pause
  • #put
  • #get_match_rt
  • #pause_rt

Text API Functions

  • #match_get
  • #match_get_m
  • #match_wait
  • #match_wait_goto
  • #wait
  • #wait_for
  • #wait_for_roundtime

Core API Models

  • Container
  • Exp
  • Inventory
  • Room
  • Rt
  • Ct
  • Spell
  • Status
  • Vitals
  • Wield
  • Map
  • Client

Core API Modules

  • Observer
